text: kha tæ phwk ceakhxng kha phraxngkh khx thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ kha phraxngkh læa phx mæ khxng kha phraxngkh læa phu thi khea ma nı ban khxng kha phraxngkh pen phu sraththa læa brrda phu sraththa chay læa brrda phu sraththa hying læa phraxngkh than xya di pheim xan dı kæ phwk xthrrm hela nan nxkcak khwam phinas hayna theanan
